generator.title: #1 World's Photorealistic Image Generator
generator.description: Best and Free AI image generator with FLUX.1 Krea. Start by describing your image and click generate.

input.placeholder: Describe the image you want to create...

examples.prompt: A close-up portrait of a thoughtful elderly man in his 70s, his face a map of wrinkles and wisdom. He sits by a window on a cloudy day, the soft, diffused light highlighting the texture of his tweed jacket and the silver stubble on his chin. A single tear escapes his eye, capturing a moment of quiet reflection. Photorealistic, shallow depth of field, 50mm lens, a sense of melancholy and nostalgia.

A rain-slicked asphalt street in Tokyo at night, after a heavy downpour. The vibrant neon lights of Shinjuku signs are reflected brilliantly in the wet ground and puddles. A lone person walks away under a transparent umbrella. Slight motion blur on a passing car's taillights. Cinematic, moody, hyperrealistic, sharp focus on the water reflections.

An overhead shot of a rustic wooden breakfast table in the morning. A ceramic bowl half-full of yogurt and berries, a few granola crumbs scattered on the table. A glass of iced coffee with condensation dripping down the side. Dappled sunlight filters through a nearby plant, casting soft shadows on the table. Photorealistic, high detail, warm and inviting atmosphere.

Interior of a vast, derelict factory. Concrete floors are cracked and dusty. A single, powerful beam of sunlight shines through a broken window high above, illuminating thick dust motes floating in the air. Rusted machinery sits in deep shadow. High contrast, atmospheric, volumetric lighting, photorealistic, sense of forgotten grandeur.

Extreme macro photo of the forest floor after a morning rain. A vibrant green moss covers a fallen log. Tiny, glistening water droplets cling to the moss fibers and a small brown mushroom. A single ant is crawling over the log. The background is a soft, blurry bokeh of green and brown leaves. Shot on a 100mm macro lens, tack sharp focus, photorealistic.

A detailed shot of a vintage car's interior. Sunlight streams through the driver's side window, highlighting the texture of the worn brown leather seats and the polished grain of the wooden steering wheel. A set of old keys with a simple leather fob rests in the ignition. Dust is visible on the dashboard. Photorealistic, shallow depth of field, nostalgic feel.

Commercial product photography of a sophisticated chronograph watch resting on a dark, textured slate surface. Studio softbox lighting from the side subtly highlights the brushed steel of the casing and polished edges. The sapphire crystal glass is perfectly clear, revealing the intricate details of the matte black watch face, its subdials, and silver hands. A microscopic speck of dust sits on the crystal, visible only upon close inspection. The brown leather strap shows fine stitching and a natural, subtle wear pattern. Moody, luxurious, hyperrealistic, shot on a Hasselblad medium format camera.

introduce.name: introduce
introduce.title: Escape the 'AI Look'
introduce.label: Philosophy
introduce.description: Flux1 Krea is not just another image generator. It's an advanced, opinionated model focused on one thing: producing the most natural and authentic photorealistic images. Developed by Black Forest Labs in collaboration with Krea, it's engineered to overcome the artificial flaws of conventional AI imagery.

items.title: Subtle & Natural Aesthetics
items.description: Our model is trained to create images with natural lighting, textures, and colors, avoiding the artificial, oversaturated look.

items.title: A Master of Photorealism
items.description: From detailed portraits to complex scenes, Flux1 excels at creating images indistinguishable from professional photography.

items.title: Opinionated by Design
items.description: Flux1 has a built-in artistic direction, making it easier to achieve high-quality, realistic results without complex prompt engineering.

benefit.name: benefit
benefit.title: Why Your Vision Deserves Authentic Photorealism
benefit.label: Benefits
benefit.description: Move beyond generic AI art and create visuals with genuine depth, subtlety, and realism.

items.title: Finally, End the 'AI Look'
items.description: Tired of plastic-looking, hyper-saturated images? Our model delivers the nuance of real photography, making your visuals stand out.

items.title: Authentic Results, Faster
items.description: Achieve professional, photorealistic results without endless tweaking. Our opinionated model guides you to beautiful imagery effortlessly.

items.title: Credibility Through Collaboration
items.description: Leverage the expertise of FLUX.1 Krea, leaders in generative AI, for unparalleled image quality.

usage.name: usage
usage.title: How to Achieve True Photorealism
usage.description: Our streamlined process helps you create authentic images in just a few steps:

items.title: 1. Describe the Scene
items.description: Start with a simple or detailed prompt. Our model is tuned to understand natural language for realistic scenes.

items.title: 2. Trust the Model
items.description: Let our opinionated engine interpret the prompt, applying principles of real-world photography and light.

items.title: 3. Refine with Nuance
items.description: Make subtle adjustments if needed. Small changes go a long way in perfecting your photorealistic shot.

items.title: 4. Download Your Photograph
items.description: Export a high-resolution image that captures the essence of a real photograph, not an AI generation.

feature.name: feature
feature.title: Features Designed for Realism
feature.description: Every tool is built to support the creation of authentic, lifelike images.

items.title: Advanced Photorealism Engine
items.description: Powered by Black Forest Labs' research to generate lifelike details, from skin texture to natural lighting.

items.title: Natural Color Science
items.description: Generates images with a balanced, realistic color palette, steering clear of the hyper-saturated digital look.

items.title: High-Fidelity Detail
items.description: Excels in rendering the fine, subtle details that differentiate a real photo from a digital imitation.

items.title: Coherent Scene Composition
items.description: Understands how objects and light interact in the real world to create believable, cohesive scenes.

items.title: Subtle Imperfection Option
items.description: Optionally add minor, realistic imperfections like film grain or soft focus to enhance authenticity.

items.title: Realism Upscaler
items.description: Increase resolution while preserving the natural texture and detail, avoiding an overly-sharpened digital look.

pricing.description: Start for free, upgrade when you need more power

items.title: Anna Klein
items.label: Professional Photographer

items.title: David Chen

items.title: Leo Ricci

faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Everything you need to know about our focus on photorealism.

items.title: What do you mean by an 'opinionated' model?
items.description: An opinionated model has a specific, built-in aesthetic—in our case, natural photorealism. This helps users achieve high-quality, consistent results that align with this style, rather than being a generic tool that tries to do everything at a mediocre level.

items.title: How does Flux1 avoid the 'AI look'?
items.description: Our model was trained on a carefully curated dataset that emphasizes real-world photography. It's specifically tuned to reproduce natural light, subtle textures, and balanced color palettes, while actively avoiding the hyper-saturated and artificially smooth outputs common in other models.

items.title: Who are FLUX.1 Krea?
items.description: Black Forest Labs is an AI research company specializing in advanced generative models. Krea is a leading creative AI suite. They have collaborated to bring the specialized Flux1 model to life, combining cutting-edge research with a user-focused platform.

items.title: Is this only for professional photographers?
items.description: Not at all! While it's powerful enough for professionals, it's designed to be easy for anyone to use. If you want to create images that look like real photos, without needing to be an expert in photography or complex prompts, Flux1 is the perfect tool for you.

items.title: Can I still create artistic or non-photorealistic images?
items.description: Flux1's core strength and 'opinion' is photorealism. While you can certainly create a range of images, it will always lean towards a more realistic and natural interpretation of your prompt. For stylized or abstract art, other models might be more suitable.
